AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Aquaculture worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Feeding the fish and checking their condition is a job anyone can do. This is why {PAWN_nameDef} was able to find employment. {PAWN_pronoun} spent many hours interacting with the empty-eyed fish beyond the glass, all while equipped with deepblue extractor.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Humble collector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} has no interest in the lighthouse’s popular collection of colorful, expensive knives, famous Siren cards, or impossible-to-replicate holograms. Instead, {PAWN_pronoun} is creating {PAWN_possessive} own precious and modest collection. While it may be useless to most, {PAWN_pronoun} finds happiness in it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Smuggling collaborator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef}’s innocent face and quick feet have saved {PAWN_possessive} in many situations. Feeling overconfident, {PAWN_nameDef} began collaborating with smugglers for a more thrilling experience. The risks were great, but the rewards and excitement were even greater, and {PAWN_pronoun} enjoyed it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Bright child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoyed learning and was always at the top of {PAWN_possessive} class. However, {PAWN_nameDef} eventually fell behind. In {PAWN_possessive} frustration, {PAWN_nameDef} discovered that others were using drugs and developed a strong urge to try them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Arrogant child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was a Moyo who pursued what {PAWN_pronoun} wanted with clarity and determination. {PAWN_pronoun} focused solely on social activities, avoiding other concerns. The positive aspect of this was {PAWN_possessive} wide network of relationships, while the negative aspects were abundant.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Seaweed farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} cultivated various seaweeds, including Depthweeds. Although the nature of {PAWN_possessive} job was far from the grandeur of the lighthouse, there wasn’t much to worry about aside from occasional intruders damaging the seaweed forest. Perhaps it would have been better for {PAWN_possessive} to have stayed there.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Aquaculture owner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} was the owner of a tuna farming operation. The sight of the neatly arranged aquaculture tanks was extremely tedious for {PAWN_possessive}, who desired the grandeur of the lighthouse. {PAWN_pronoun} sought ways to make money more easily, exploring ways to improve the quality and diversity of the fish species and considering connections with other businesses. In the end, {PAWN_pronoun} reached the conclusion of Deep Blue.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Coastal explorer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: To delve into the endlessly deep sea requires a significant amount of resources. {PAWN_nameDef} explored the shallow seas, discovering numerous resources and terrains for the lighthouse to use. However, as the expansion of the lighthouse slowed, {PAWN_possessive} role came to an end. Ultimately, {PAWN_pronoun} was left with nothing even {PAWN_possessive} exploration equipment being taken away, and found {PAWN_possessive}self stuck in the upper levels.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Fisher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} plays a crucial role in supplying food to the lighthouse. As the ecosystem around the lighthouse has already been ruined, {PAWN_pronoun} had to fish in ever more distant waters. The price of {PAWN_possessive} efforts is met with complaints and dissatisfaction from consumers over the increased costs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since ordinary fish won’t make much money, {PAWN_nameDef} hunted and captured rarer or more dangerous creatures. As {PAWN_possessive} business grew more famous, {PAWN_pronoun} began to expand the scope of {PAWN_possessive} hunts, driven by the taste of money.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Naked diver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} grew tired of the competition in the lighthouse and took refuge in the upper levels. The natural beauty {PAWN_pronoun} encountered there captivated {PAWN_possessive}. Now, {PAWN_pronoun} plunges into the sea with only a respirator, immersing {PAWN_possessive}self in nature, hoping that one day {PAWN_pronoun} can completely escape the lighthouse.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Humble teacher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Though the facilities in the upper levels of the lighthouse are poor, they are nothing compared to the flood slum. Knowing this well, {PAWN_nameDef} is passionately teaching to ensure that no child falls into the flood slum. Regardless of the outcome, {PAWN_nameDef} is a person with a pure intention rarely seen in the lighthouse.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Vigilante
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the outer areas like the upper levels of the lighthouse, public authority has little reach. {PAWN_nameDef} joined a volunteer militia to protect what {PAWN_pronoun} holds dear. Although it is nothing more than an unarmed and untrained group, {PAWN_pronoun} worked hard to maintain order.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Vigilante leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} led a vigilante group in the upper levels, working to gather members and create a better society. Ironically, the biggest challenge {PAWN_pronoun} faced was dealing with public authority questioning the legality of the vigilante activities.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Corrupt vigilante leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is the leader of a powerful vigilante group in the upper levels. They received a modest activity fee as a 'donation' and used it to build connections in various places, allowing them to wield significant influence. All of this was thanks to {PAWN_possessive} exceptional leadership and negotiation skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Surface enthusiast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is an eccentric who insists that they must leave the dark depths of the sea and rise to the surface. They believe that the lighthouse underwater is irreparably chaotic and that a fresh start is needed. Whether realistic or not, {PAWN_pronoun} is convinced that everyone will eventually recognize the truth of {PAWN_possessive} ideas.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Surface advocate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a Moyo who has already left the lighthouse and ascended to the surface. After joining a group of Moyo refugees like {PAWN_possessive}, {PAWN_nameDef} took on the role of an agent, tasked with helping other Moyos escape to the surface.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Moyo Healthy meal expert
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is an expert in healthy meal, focusing on ingredients sourced directly from nature rather than processed ones. Ironically, {PAWN_pronoun} is not actually interested in healthy food; {PAWN_pronoun} simply aimed to make the best of a limited situation.
